title: Link - Action
description: Eye-catching links for primary calls to action

frontMatter.title: Link - Action
frontMatter.description: Eye-catching links for primary calls to action

when_to_use.value: Entice users to start digital services or applications
Create emphasis on navigational links needing visual prominence
Direct users to begin a benefit application or online tool
Display multiple action links of equal importance (secondary variation)
Provide contrast on dark-background areas (reverse variation)

when_to_consider_else.value: **Authentication actions:** Use buttons for "sign up," "submit," or "sign out"
**Form progression:** Use Button - Primary for moving between form steps
**Non-action navigation:** Don't replace standard links with action links

content_considerations.value: Keep link text brief and action-oriented
Start with a verb (e.g., "Apply for health care benefits")
Ensure purpose and target are clear

accessibility.value: Default behavior appends "(opens in a new tab)" text

frontMatter.code_usage:
<!-- Primary entry -->
<va-link-action
  href="/apply"
  text="Apply for health care benefits"
  type="primary"
></va-link-action>

<!-- Secondary -->
<va-link-action
  href="/learn-more"
  text="Learn more about eligibility"
  type="secondary"
></va-link-action>

<!-- Reverse (for dark backgrounds) -->
<va-link-action
  href="/start"
  text="Start your application"
  type="reverse"
></va-link-action>
